Package library

Interface Library

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReferenceManagemente
public interface Library

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
2019 / 2020

The "contract" that identifies which operations has to be available to handle a data structure used to store Reference

Authors:

  • @author Ricardo Santos
  • @author Bruno Oliveira
  • @author Fábio Silva
  • @author João Ramos
  • @author Óscar Oliveira

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int add​(Reference reference)
    Adds a reference to the data structure used to store reference.
    int getNumberOfReferencesByAuthor​(java.lang.String author)
    Returns the number of references of a given author.
    void printAll​(CitationStyle citationStyle)
    Prints all references stored in the data structure according to the citation style.
    void reset​(int size)
    Resets the library and initialize the collections with a different size.

  • Method Details

    • reset

      void reset​(int size)
      Resets the library and initialize the collections with a different size. Previous Reference are discarded.
      Parameters:
      size - The collection size of reference

    • add

      int add​(Reference reference)
      Adds a reference to the data structure used to store reference. The method returns one of the following outputs: 0, if there is no space for more references, 1, if the reference is new and is added to the library 2 if the reference already exists and is added (as duplicate) to the library
      Parameters:
      reference - The reference to be added
      Returns:
      0, if there is no space for more references 1, if the reference is new and is added to the library 2, if the reference already exists and is added (as duplicate) to the library

    • getNumberOfReferencesByAuthor

      int getNumberOfReferencesByAuthor​(java.lang.String author)
      Returns the number of references of a given author.
      Parameters:
      author - The author name.
      Returns:
      The number of references of a given author

    • printAll

      void printAll​(CitationStyle citationStyle)
      Prints all references stored in the data structure according to the citation style.
      Parameters:
      citationStyle - The citation style to be applied.
